_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
A slight chance of snow between 2pm and 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 18. Wind chill values as low as -15. South southwest wind 9 to 11 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Deer Valley has received  11 of snow in the last 24 hours. For real-time updates including terrain and chairlift openings, we encourage guests to download the Ikon Pass App or explore the Mountain Report on our website.
_inspectorSnowReport.AdditionalText: Deer Valley has received  11 of snow in the last 24 hours. For real-time updates including terrain and chairlift openings, we encourage guests to download the Ikon Pass App or explore the Mountain Report on our website.
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: Deer Valley parking is at capacity today, 2/19. Please park at the Richardson Flat Park & Ride, then use Park City Transit to access the resort. For more tips on accessing Deer Valley, visit our Transportation blog.
